Name: Manhattan (Dry)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon or orange zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon or orange zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A bone dry Manhattan for those with dry palates. If you like Dry Martinis then be sure to try one of these.
Nutrition: One serving of Manhattan (Dry) contains 178 calories
